title: Episode #60 - How Smelly Was the Past?
itunes:author: History Is Sexy
itunes:summary:
Was the past stinky? Were medieval peasants covered in poo like Monty Python? Did people really piss out of windows like in Blackadder? Were the streets of medieval London rivers of animal guts and dung? Or were the people of the past just like us? 
Let's find out!

Show notes: https://historyissexy.com/show-notes/episode-60-how-smelly-was-the-past
